short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: List fruits and vegetables with their nutritional information and uses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fruit & Veggie Health is a simple and informative extension that provides essential details about various fruits and vegetables, including their nutritional content and health benefits. Whether you're curious about the vitamins and minerals in your favorite produce or looking for specific foods to improve your health, this extension has got you covered.

Features:

Searchable Database: Explore a wide range of fruits and vegetables with a simple and easy-to-use search function.
Nutritional Information: Each fruit and vegetable is accompanied by details on key nutrients such as vitamins, minerals, and fiber.
Health Benefits: Learn about the health advantages, from boosting your immune system to improving heart health.
User-Friendly Design: Clean and modern interface with easy navigation, perfect for daily use.
Copyright Information: Footer section includes copyright details with a link to AskBart.Org.
Enhance your diet and make better choices with quick access to nutrition facts and benefits, right from your browser!

How it works:

1. Install the extension.
2. Click on the icon in your browser toolbar to open the list of fruits and vegetables.
3. Use the search bar to quickly find detailed information about each item.
4. Explore nutritional content and discover the health benefits of adding these foods to your diet.
